mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist (user_id, artist_name, artist_id, image, genre, liked) VALUES (#{userId}, #{artistName}, #{artistId}, #{image}, #{genre}, #{liked})
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM artist a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.liked = true
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, image, genre, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM artist WHERE liked = true GROUP BY artist_id, artist_name, image, genre ORDER BY likeCount ASC LIMIT 10
